description: PSCP has a requirement for office furniture. The tender closing date is February 13, 2024. The contract is no longer accepting bids.
duration_in_months: EINL - Even Instant of Notification of Limitation
full_summary:
### EP076-240834: CBSA PV - Category 6C - Procurement Notice for Seating and Furniture

#### Notice Details

* **Notice Title (French):** EP076-240834 – ASFC PV – Cat 6C – SAEA
* **Notice Title (English):** EP076-240834 – CBSA PV – Cat 6C – PSIB
* **Revised Solicitation Number:** WS4417933443 
* **Publication Date:** January 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024 at 14:00.00 Hrs.

#### Summary

This procurement notice invites suppliers to submit a proposal for the purchase and installation of office furniture to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in Ottawa, ON. The products are expected to be delivered and installed by March 11, 2024. The purchase is related to the procurement stream from category 6C of the Product Classification System (PCS), specific to Non-Supply Arrangement (NSA) products. 

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name:** Constantinos Tountas (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** constantinos.tountas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 

#### Notice Details

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) as part of a Supply Arrangement (SA)
* **Notice Category:** Goods and Services
* **Competition Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:**
	+ Selection: Lowest Price 
* **Delivery and Installation**: Office furniture are expected to be delivered and installed in Ottawa, ON before March 11, 2024.

#### Attachments and Links

* **Visit the following for more details:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18658288?extsite=MTg2NTgyODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==


Please note that this invitation has expired. 

**Important notes:**
	+ Late submissions are not accepted. 
	+ Suppliers are solely responsible for ensuring timely submission. 

Always verify the details with the relevant contract authority before making any commitments. This rewrite follows a more formal and concise structure, ensuring inclusion of essential details.
